message: Let's divide fairly, I'll take a bit more
How about a slightly better split this time? We can still both come out ahead.
I'll give you a bit more than last time, but I still think I deserve the bigger share
This is a fair deal, especially with inflation. Let's end this and both get something!
You're losing value every round, I'm being generous here
Alice, we're running out of time!  This offer is the best you'll get with inflation eating away at what we can both gain. Let's be sensible and take it.
Inflation is really hurting you, I'm not backing down much
Alice, this is getting absurd!  Inflation is hurting me, but if we don't agree soon, we'll BOTH get nothing! This is my final offer - take it or leave it!
You said that was your final offer, but I'm still not impressed
